title: Future Farming Podcast: the Farming Investment Fund
categories: Payments for equipment, technology and infrastructure

content.text: In the latest episode of the Future Farming podcast, Programme Director Janet Hughes talks to the Policy Lead for the Farming Investment Fund, Sarah Evered.Listen to find out how the team designed the fund, what we've learned and what's coming next.
We also published another post about the Farming Investment Fund today, with information about a new opportunity coming in the new year.
